title: Duvessa

|   | A plain-looking elven fighter who is technically brilliant in many forms of combat, but over-confident because of it. She is complemented by the magical skills of her twin brother, Dowan. She journeys to the surface to challenge its greatest champions.***“Twin children: the Girl, she was plain; The Brother was handsome & vain; ‘Let him brag of his looks,’ Father said; ‘mind your books! The best beauty is bred in the brain.’” -Aesop & Walter Crane, \_The Baby’s Own Aesop\_, 36: “Brother & Sister”. 1887. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Duvessa, Sister of [Dowan](/Dowan "Dowan")** is one of a pair of twin [elf](/Elf "Elf") [uniques](/Unique "Unique") that hunt through the [Dungeon](/Dungeon "Dungeon") as a team, always encountered together. On her own, Duvessa is a moderately strong melee fighter, and Dowan can even [haste](/Haste "Haste") his sister. Killing one sibling will buff the other.

When Dowan is killed, Duvessa gains permanent [berserk](/Berserk "Berserk") the moment she sees you.

## Location

- [The Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"):4-7

## Tips & Tricks

- Neither Duvessa nor Dowan will follow you up or down [stairs](/Stairs "Stairs"), unless their sibling is adjacent to you too (in which case they both will) or their sibling is dead.
- A berserk Duvessa hits very hard and very fast, but only hurts in melee range and has no ranged attacks. Dowan can pelt you with strong magic, but has less durability.
- Consider wearing them both down before killing either of them. The survivor's HP will still be fairly low even after finding hidden power.

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), Duvessa's berserk would eventually wear off; you could go upstairs and wait it out. Unlike Dowan, Duvessa didn't gain any permanent benefit (she only went berserk once), so it was often best to kill the brother first.
html:
Duvessa

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all elves, see list of deep elves.

Duvessa e 
HP 23-48
HD 4
XP 144
Speed 10
AC 2
EV 9
Will 40
Attack1 10 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type elf, elf
Flags Fighter
Speaks
Warm-blooded
Unique
Female
A plain-looking elven fighter who is technically brilliant in many forms of combat, but over-confident because of it. She is complemented by the magical skills of her twin brother, Dowan. She journeys to the surface to challenge its greatest champions.

“Twin children: the Girl, she was plain;
The Brother was handsome & vain;
‘Let him brag of his looks,’
Father said; ‘mind your books!
The best beauty is bred in the brain.’”
-Aesop & Walter Crane, _The Baby’s Own Aesop_, 36: “Brother & Sister”. 1887.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Duvessa, Sister of Dowan is one of a pair of twin elf uniques that hunt through the Dungeon as a team, always encountered together. On her own, Duvessa is a moderately strong melee fighter, and Dowan can even haste his sister. Killing one sibling will buff the other.

When Dowan is killed, Duvessa gains permanent berserk the moment she sees you.

Location

  • The Dungeon:4-7

Tips & Tricks

  • Neither Duvessa nor Dowan will follow you up or down stairs, unless their sibling is adjacent to you too (in which case they both will) or their sibling is dead.
  • A berserk Duvessa hits very hard and very fast, but only hurts in melee range and has no ranged attacks. Dowan can pelt you with strong magic, but has less durability.
  • Consider wearing them both down before killing either of them. The survivor's HP will still be fairly low even after finding hidden power.

History

  • Prior to 0.28, Duvessa's berserk would eventually wear off; you could go upstairs and wait it out. Unlike Dowan, Duvessa didn't gain any permanent benefit (she only went berserk once), so it was often best to kill the brother first.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Duvessa&oldid=74688"

{{version030}}
''For a list of all elves, see [[list of deep elves]].''
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Duvessa, Sister of [[Dowan]]''' is one of a pair of twin [[elf]] [[unique]]s that hunt through the [[Dungeon]] as a team, always encountered together. On her own, Duvessa is a moderately strong melee fighter, and Dowan can even [[haste]] his sister. Killing one sibling will buff the other.

When Dowan is killed, Duvessa gains permanent [[berserk]] the moment she sees you.

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:4-7

==Tips & Tricks==
*Neither Duvessa nor Dowan will follow you up or down [[stairs]], unless their sibling is adjacent to you too (in which case they both will) or their sibling is dead.
*A berserk Duvessa hits very hard and very fast, but only hurts in melee range and has no ranged attacks. Dowan can pelt you with strong magic, but has less durability.
*Consider wearing them both down before killing either of them. The survivor's HP will still be fairly low even after finding hidden power.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.28]], Duvessa's berserk would eventually wear off; you could go upstairs and wait it out. Unlike Dowan, Duvessa didn't gain any permanent benefit (she only went berserk once), so it was often best to kill the brother first.
